amendment.description: Page 301, line 3, after the dollar amount, insert "(reduced by $30,000,000)". Page 326, line 21, after the dollar amount, insert "(increased by $30,000,000)".
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 53 printed in House Report 115-259 to transfer to the Spending Reduction Account funding for Department of Energy disposal of defense nuclear waste, including acquisition of real property or facility construction/expansion.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Rosen amendment was withdrawn.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A033) offered by Ms. Rosen.
